title: Remove arbitrary max_subtasks limit of 10
description:
Current max_subtasks is capped at 10 in swarm_decompose and swarm_plan_prompt tools. This is arbitrary and limits complex task decomposition.

## Current State
- Default: 5 subtasks
- Max: 10 subtasks (enforced in tool schemas)
- Core schema (schemas/task.ts) has no max

## Proposed
- Remove the .max(10) constraints from tool schemas
- Or raise to something reasonable like 25-50
- Let the LLM and coordinator decide appropriate granularity

## Files
- packages/opencode-swarm-plugin/src/swarm-decompose.ts (lines 441, 456, 706)
- packages/opencode-swarm-plugin/src/swarm-prompts.ts (lines 931, 946)
- packages/opencode-swarm-plugin/src/eval-capture.ts (line 67)
